import React from 'react' import Avatar from './avatar' import DateFormater from './date-formater' import CoverImage from './cover-image' import Link from 'next/link' import Author from '../types/author' type Props = { title: string coverImage: string date: string excerpt: string author: Author slug: string } const PostPreview: React.FC = ({ title, coverImage, date, excerpt, author, slug, }) => { return (

{title}

{excerpt}

) } export default PostPreview
